snippet.title: The Plucky Squire | Launch Trailer | Out Now!
snippet.description:
Jump off the page and into adventure: https://thepluckysquire.com/

Storybook characters discover a three-dimensional world outside the pages of their book and must jump between 2D & 3D realms to save their friends in this charming action-adventure.

Paper engineering by Julia Yus (https://www.instagram.com/paperjulia/) and Yeray Pérez Vallejo (http://carbonara.es).

Visit our website for more info: https://www.devolverdigital.com/

Subscribe for more: https://shorturl.at/PP3ed

Follow Devolver Digital
X/Twitter:  https://twitter.com/devolverdigital
Facebook:   https://www.facebook.com/DevolverDigital/
Instagram:   https://www.instagram.com/devolverdigital/
TikTok:   https://www.tiktok.com/@devolverdigital

#indiegames #devolver #digital
